title: How should a beginner approach for answer writing for UPSC Mains? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is the biggest hurdle that a aspirant faces - The dreaded blank paper. One thing that you can do is read the question and jot down any point that comes to your mind on a paper. Don’t worry about format or structure for now just like a brainstorming session do this and then see the model answer and compare how many points you got and what you miss and more importantly what you jotted down is relevant or not. After a while things will naturally happen.
